meanings.definition: A substance that promotes the growth of beneficial bacteria in the gut.
meanings.sent1: Adding prebiotic to your diet can help your gut stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: Many people consume prebiotic foods like bananas to support their gut health.
meanings.sent3: The friendly bacteria in your stomach throw a party when you give them prebiotic treats.
meanings.sent4: Prebiotic acts like a welcome sign for good bacteria to thrive in your intestines.
meanings.sent5: Imagine prebiotic as a fertilizer for the helpful microbes in your belly garden.

meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting a substance that promotes the growth of beneficial bacteria in the gut.
meanings.sent1: Including prebiotic ingredients in your meals can be beneficial for your digestive system.
meanings.sent2: The prebiotic supplements are designed to enhance the growth of good bacteria in your gut.
meanings.sent3: The chef proudly presented his prebiotic recipe, claiming it was a gut-friendly masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as prebiotic as the food she served, spreading positivity and warmth.
meanings.sent5: The prebiotic label on the product assured customers of its gut health benefits.
